long_description: Easy to refill without removing the reservoir, the CamelBak Rogue hydration pack melds an efficient low-profile silhouette with enough storage for a couple of hours on your bike. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir is equipped with an easy-to-open filler cap that can access via a quick-release flap on the front of the pack. 2 external pockets store small items such as keys, wallet, phone; stretchy elastic side panels provide for expansion to fit a layer you shed. Dual compression straps shores up volume when pack is empty. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring no leakage during transport. Bike tool organizer pocket is designed to carry a multitool and pump. Zippered external top pocket includes a handy clip that makes it easy to find your keys at the end of the ride. CamelBak Rogue hydration pack has reflective detailing that increases your visibility in low light as well as a spot to attach a blinking safety light (light not included).
short_description: Easy to refill without removing the reservoir, the CamelBak Rogue hydration pack melds an efficient low-profile silhouette with enough storage for a couple of hours on your bike.
